content.heading: Key Activities:
items: Introduction to Design Thinking & Problem Solving.
Understanding societal challenges through UN SDGs.
Tech modules: IoT, AI, Robotics, Blockchain, CPS (Cyber-Physical Systems), Sustainability Engineering.

content.heading: Mentorship & Exploration:
items: Mentorship: Sessions led by industry leaders and academic experts.
Team Formation: Interdisciplinary teams of students and startups.
Problem Statement Exploration: Challenges from sectors like Health, Agriculture, Energy, Water, Infrastructure, Environment, Governance, Security, etc.

content.text: The final round of evaluation will take place at CBII, Shivalik College of Engineering.
